description:
Learn how to use the Violet Wand (Violet Ray) electrical stimulation toy. This low current, high voltage, high-frequency, generator uses glass cathode tubes other attachments to safely deliver an adjustable static electric charge to the body. This enables a wide range of sensations. Learn basic safety and operation, as well as the proper use of various attachments, or your bare hands, and other techniques. See how to use the wand with various shaped cathodes, even insertables, as well as with other items including metal pinwheels, banjo picks, chains, edged tools, silverware, a metal cage, and even metallic clothing or mylar-woven ropes. Plus, see basic fireplay sparked using a violet wand. This comprehensive tutorial covers the...
* Direct Method
* Indirect Method
* Reverse Method
title: Violet Wand Electrical Play
